items.title: Hear An Iconic Composition Played Entirely By Surveillance Cameras
items.description: Axis Communications demonstrates its AI object analytics with an unconventional orchestra that turns security cameras into instruments playing a sci-f...

items.title: 3 Surprising Reasons Why AI Has Become Our Confidante, By A Psychologist
items.description: Our emotional ties to AI aren’t just fanciful. They follow patterns rooted in classic attachment theory, according to a new study.

items.title: Legal AI Startup Legora Is In Talks To Raise Funding At A $1.8 Billion Valuation
items.description: Just four months after its Series B funding round, the Stockholm-based legal AI startup is picking up more capital.

items.title: Arm Joins $250 Million Funding Round Of Korean AI Chip Startup Rebellions
items.description: Arm, the chip designer backed by SoftBank, invests in Rebellions for the first time. It’s also Arm’s first investment in an Asian startup.

items.title: ‘LEGO Party’ Review (Switch): Great Ideas, Dodgy Execution
items.description: For every one of its strength — and there are a lot of good ideas on show — LEGO Party doesn’t make itself a top competitor in the genre.
